titles.title: Burt Lake Band of Ottawa and Chippewa Indians Act of 1994
A bill to reaffirm and clarify the Federal relationship of the Burt Lake Band as a distinct federally recognized Indian Tribe, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10634)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary: 8/4/1994--Introduced. Burt Lake Band of Ottawa and Chippewa Indians Act of 1994 - Reaffirms Federal recognition and rights of the Burt Lake Band of Ottawa and Chippewa Indians (in the State of Michigan), including Federal services, benefits, and tribal lands.
